data.title: Ferguson, Duncan of Yarmouth
data.text:
DUNCAN FERGUSON of YARMOUTH

2 BOOKS

A WEBSITE

A FAMILY and DESCENDANTS

Our extended family, descended from Duncan Ferguson is privileged to have an incredible couple of documents which cover the lives of five generations and now relate to a possible eight generations numbering well over a thousand individuals including spouses.

Etta Fingland's original was published in 1951; and J. Norman and Malcolm S. Ferguson published a 425 page, hard bound book in 1980 (now listed on Amazon). It recounts a pioneer history and details 10 family lines.

Duncan Ferguson (crofter), his wife and family of ten emigrated from Argyllshire, Scotland in 1830 to Yarmouth Township, Canada West. They were true pioneers in the finest North American tradition.

This website exists to tell the family story in new media to transcribe a story which has already been published ; but which is ongoing through the lives of Duncan's family.

The RootsWeb Website replaces our earlier site discontinued in November 2012.

WE ARE UNDER CONSTRUCTION HERE........hoping to add much of the published history in weeks to come ....J L Ferguson, November 2012

15 PAGES AND COUNTING (Jan 1st) - GO TO OUR SITE CONTENTS PAGE BELOW

or LINK TO .......
